title: Texting Tutor PT 3: Her Bridezilla Cousin Will Drop Her From The Wedding If She Doesn't Do *THIS*
description:
There are way too many wedding activities to be involved in, and she doesn’t know how to tell the bride she can’t do it all.
She wants to be involved in her cousin’s wedding, but she just got a new job and won’t be able to attend everything.
She wants our help texting the cousin to ask for a break.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: Pionaire Podcasting
